title: National Mall and Memorial Parks: Education
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education             Education        Students gather on the steps of the Lincoln Memorial. NPSPhoto       Experience National Mall and Memorial Parks with your students! The park offers a variety of free curriculum-based programs for students of all ages. Please contact us for information about the programs we offer and to schedule your visit. Email Education Staff  Programs are subject to availability and scheduled on a first-come-first-served basis. We may also be able to work with you to create a program specifically for your class. Park rangers may be available for presentations at your school. Rangers focus on historical and natural park resources, as well as the National Park Service and careers in the parks.      Every Kid in a Park Bringing your fourth graders to National Mall and Memorial Parks? Let us know, and a ranger can greet you in the park and tell your students about the President's "Every Kid in a Park" initiative! Email us  to let us know when you will be visiting the park.  For more information about the Every Kid in a Park initiative.
